rules.description: Global: Right Command + K/O/L/; → Arrow Keys

Precision Mode: Set Arrows XY True

Precision Mode: Right Arrow Use XY Mod
Precision Aim Modifier: Use Left Click as Command-V

rules.description: Control-0 → 'Center Current Application on Primary Display'
